name: [EMnify] Data exchange has stopped unexpectedly for a device
query: avg(last_1d):anomalies(avg:endpoint.volume{*} by {host}.as_count().fill(zero, 0).rollup(sum, 900), 'robust', 2, direction='below', interval=300, alert_window='last_1h', seasonality='hourly', timezone='utc', count_default_zero='true') >= 0.5
message: It was expected that the device was going to keep exchanging data when actually it did not.

recommended_monitor_metadata.description: Notify your team when data usage has stopped.
